sources.title: Connecticut Yankee
sources.description: A Connecticut Yankee (1931) Fox Film Corporation (Twentieth Century Fox) Hank Morgan (Will Rogers) takes a trip back in time to King Arthur's Court. Based on the novel by Mark Twain. mildly colorized Will Rogers as Hank Martin William Farnum as King Arthur Frank Albertson as Emile le Poulet / Clarence Maureen O'Sullivan as Alisande Brandon Hurst as Merlin Myrna Loy as Queen Morgan le Fay Mitchell Harris as Sagramore I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
